data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample DEASE-11

Exposition W, Slope 5 deg, Geology: Silikat-Moräne, Tree line 1290 m, av. Tree height 25 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 70%, Herb cover 25%, Moss cover 100%, Vegatation type: Alt. Best. an vernässtem W-Hang dir an W'g, Film number: 744A
